column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had filled up from the gratuitous sides and 16 oz each of meat and thought about going with a couple glasses of Port to cap off a wonderful night.  John said "I think I have the perfect thing for you" - and proceeded to tell us about green chartreuse - an herbal liquor developed by some ancient Monks and still produced today.  He said it'd be the perfect finish to our meal.  He offered a taste and it was PERFECT.  It's super "herby" and a bit absinthe-like medicinal but wow - what a perfect way to end a great meal!  We had never heard of it before
column2: but will definitely add it to the liquor cabinet to close out future good meals (trust me
